name: Destroy The Cubes - Minimalist Puzzle
description:
Destroy The Cubes


A minimalist puzzle game that combines balls, cubes and physical intuition

Original sound effects


This game contains original sound effects prepared exclusively, use headphones to make the most of stereo sound

Challenge yourself in each level


Your challenge is to destroy all the balls in one move just before they fall into the hole



For that you need to click and drag to drop the balls in the right position and direction



At the end there will also be cannons to help you



  • Intuitive: No previous knowledge required, click and drag system makes the game very intuitive
  • Simple: No previous skill required to play, levels are set up for you to learn to play while playing
  • Minimalist: No score, no timer and no pressure. Solve the puzzles in your time and enjoy the game experience
  • Level progression: 56 unique levels, where the challenge increases with new mechanics
